info.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Microsoft Defender for Cloud) resource provider

get.description: Gets a provided Microsoft Defender for Cloud pricing configuration in a scope. Valid scopes are: subscription id or a specific resource id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates a provided Microsoft Defender for Cloud pricing configuration in the scope. Valid scopes are: subscription id or a specific resource id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Gets a provided Microsoft Defender for Cloud pricing configuration in a scope. Valid scopes are: subscription id or a specific resource id.

200.description: Successfully deleted the pricing configuration of the resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists Microsoft Defender for Cloud pricing configurations (both subscription and resource level) of the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

Pricing.description: Microsoft Defender for Cloud is provided in two pricing tiers: free and standard. The standard tier offers advanced security capabilities, while the free tier offers basic security features.

PricingProperties.description: Pricing properties for the relevant scope

pricingTier.description: The pricing tier value. Microsoft Defender for Cloud is provided in two pricing tiers: free and standard. The standard tier offers advanced security capabilities, while the free tier offers basic security features. This field will be deprecated.

values.description: Get free Microsoft Defender for Cloud experience with basic security features
Get the standard Microsoft Defender for Cloud experience with advanced security features

isEnabled.description: Whether the plan is enabled on the scope or not.

subPlan.description: The sub-plan selected for a Standard pricing configuration, when more than one sub-plan is available. Each sub-plan enables a set of security features. When not specified, full plan is applied.

freeTrialRemainingTime.description: The duration left for the subscriptions free trial period - in ISO 8601 format (e.g. P3Y6M4DT12H30M5S).

enablementTime.description: Optional. If `pricingTier` is `Standard` then this property holds the date of the last time the `pricingTier` was set to `Standard`, when available (e.g 2023-03-01T12:42:42.1921106Z).

enforce.description: Whether to allow descendants of this scope to not inherit the pricing set on this scope or not. Available only for subscription level pricing.

inherited.description: True if the pricing on this scope is inherited from a parent. The parent scope id will be in the "source" field.  Available only for resource level pricing.

source.description: The id of the scope inherited from. "Null" if not inherited. Available only for resource level pricing.

extensions.description: Optional. List of extensions offered under a plan.

deprecated.description: Optional. True if the plan is deprecated. If there are replacing plans they will appear in `replacedBy` property

replacedBy.description: Optional. List of plans that replace this plan. This property exists only if this plan is deprecated.

name.description:
The extension name. Supported values are:

**AgentlessDiscoveryForKubernetes** - API-based discovery of information about Kubernetes cluster architecture, workload objects, and setup. Required for Kubernetes inventory, identity and network exposure detection, attack path analysis and risk hunting as part of the cloud security explorer. Available for CloudPosture plan.

**OnUploadMalwareScanning** - Limits the GB to be scanned per month for each storage account within the subscription. Once this limit reached on a given storage account, Blobs won't be scanned during current calendar month. Available for StorageAccounts plan.

**SensitiveDataDiscovery** - Sensitive data discovery identifies Blob storage container with sensitive data such as credentials, credit cards, and more, to help prioritize and investigate security events. Available for StorageAccounts and CloudPosture plans.

**ContainerRegistriesVulnerabilityAssessments** - Provides vulnerability management for images stored in your container registries. Available for CloudPosture and Containers plans.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether the extension is enabled.

additionalExtensionProperties.description: Property values associated with the extension.

operationStatus.description: Optional. A status describing the success/failure of the extension's enablement/disablement operation.

OperationStatus.description: A status describing the success/failure of the extension's enablement/disablement operation.

values.description: Extension was not created/updated successfully. See operation status message for more details.

message.description: Additional information regarding the success/failure of the operation.

PlansFilter.name: plansFilter
PlansFilter.description: Optional - Plans filter, array of plan names to filter on. By default filter is off, and will return pricing for all plans.

ResourceLevelFilter.name: resourceLevelFilter
ResourceLevelFilter.description: Optional - Resource level filter - relevant only for scope = subscription. If TRUE, will not return the resource level pricings under this subscription. By default will return all pricings in both subscription and resource level.
